comments.body:
this will probably conflict with:
https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/67397
either this or that PR will need a rebase.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +124,128 @@	componentconfigs.Known.Default(cfg)

	ip := net.ParseIP(advertiseAddress)
	if ip.To4() != nil {
		cfg.ComponentConfigs.KubeProxy.BindAddress = kubeadmapiv1alpha3.DefaultProxyBindAddressv4

comments.body: nit: I don't think this roundtrip is needed

Could you add an unit test for this as well?
1) empty file ``, fail
2) a configmap or something, fail
3) non-existent path, fail
4) bare config
```yaml
kind: MasterConfiguration
apiVersion: kubeadm.k8s.io/v1alpha1
```
should pass
5) config with an option
```yaml
kind: MasterConfiguration
apiVersion: kubeadm.k8s.io/v1alpha1
kubernetesVersion: "latest"
```
should pass

However, consider this optional, since it didn't exist before
